On April 11 senior military spokesperson Mark Kimmitt declared, The stations that are showing Americans intentionally killing women and children are not legitimate news sources. That is propaganda, and that is lies. On April 15 Donald Rumsfeld echoed those reMark Kimmitts in distinctly undiplomatic terms, calling Al-Jazeera's reporting`` vicious, inaccurate and inexcusable.... However, Mr Eric Schmidt reassured investors that he does not expect any`` material change'' in the way the company is run because`` we tend to agree on pretty much everything''.
